question: A 60-minute solo practice for an intermediate player to improve drop shots.
answer:
Duration: 60 min  
Session Focus: Improving Drop Shots for Intermediate Level  

Rest between exercises: 1 min 30 s  

Warm-up (total 8–10 min)  
1. 3 min: Warmup: Compound Boast-Drive-Drop-Drive + 2 shots  
2. 3 min: Warmup: Compound Boast-Cross-Boast-Drive + 2 shots  

Session  

Condition Game 1  
• 7 pts: *Conditioned Game*: Drop-Drive: Drop-Drive (Deep Only) (Forehand)  
  (Rule: Drive: all drives first bounces must land behind T-line. Drop: all drops must be tight to the wall.)  
• 7 pts: *Conditioned Game*: Drop-Drive: Drop-Drive (Deep Only) (Backhand)  
  (Rule: Drive: all drives first bounces must land behind T-line. Drop: all drops must be tight to the wall.)  
Rest 1 min 30 s  

Condition Game 2  
• 7 pts: *Conditioned Game*: Drop-Drive: Volley Straight Drop - Drive (Deep Only) (Forehand)  
  (Rule: Drive: The first bounce of all drives must land behind the T-line. Drops must be kept low.)  
• 7 pts: *Conditioned Game*: Drop-Drive: Volley Straight Drop - Drive (Deep Only) (Backhand)  
  (Rule: Drive: The first bounce of all drives must land behind the T-line. Drops must be kept low.)  
Rest 1 min 30 s  

Condition Game 3   
• 9 pts: *Conditioned Game*: Drop-Drive: Volley Straight Drop - Straight Lob (Forehand)  
  (Rule: Straight Lob: Must be hit above the service line on the front wall, and drops need to be tight.)  
• 9 pts: *Conditioned Game*: Drop-Drive: Volley Straight Drop - Straight Lob (Backhand)  
  (Rule: Straight Lob: Must be hit above the service line on the front wall, and drops need to be tight.)  
Rest 1 min 30 s  

Condition Game 4  
• 7 pts: *Conditioned Game*: Boast-Cross-Drive: Boast-Cross-Drive With Counter Drops (Forehand)  
  (Rule: Cross & Drive: Every cross-court shot and the subsequent drive should have precise placement. Implement counter drops to maintain control.)  
• 7 pts: *Conditioned Game*: Boast-Cross-Drive: Boast-Cross-Drive With Counter Drops (Backhand)  
  (Rule: Cross & Drive: Every cross-court shot and the subsequent drive should have precise placement. Implement counter drops to maintain control.)  
Rest 1 min 30 s  

End of session.
contexts:
Duration: 60 min
Session Focus: Progressive Single ShotSide (Archetype: Progressive Single ShotSide)
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
### Warm-up ###
• 3 min: Drill: Warmup: Compound Boast-Drive-Drop-Drive + 2 shots
• 3 min: Drill: Warmup: Compound Boast-Cross-Boast-Drive + 2 shots

### Activity Block 1 ###
• 3 min: Drill: Drop-Drive: Volley Straight Drop - Straight Lob (Forehand)
  (Rule: Straight Lob: Must be hit above the service line on the front wall,...)
• 3 min: Drill: Boast-Cross-Drive: Boast-Cross-Drive With Extra Drive (Forehand)
  (Rule: All cross-court shots and drives in the main sequence must have...)
• Rest: 1.5 min

### Activity Block 2 ###
• 3 min: Drill: Drop-Drive: Drop-Drive (Deep Only) (Forehand)
  (Rule: Drive: all drives first bounces must land behind T-line. Drop: all...)
• 7 pts: Conditioned Game: Boast-Cross-Drive: Boast - Cross Lob - Volley Drive (Forehand)
  (Rule: All cross lob shots and volley drives must have their first bounce...)
• Rest: 1.5 min

### Activity Block 3 ###
• 3 min: Drill: Drop-Drive: Volley Straight Drop - Drive (Deep Only) (Forehand)
  (Rule: Drive: The first bounce of all drives must land behind the T-line....)
• 3 min: Drill: Drop-Drive: Drop-Drive (Deep Only) (Forehand)
  (Rule: Drive: all drives first bounces must land behind T-line. Drop: all...)
• Rest: 1.5 min

### Activity Block 4 ###
• 3 min: Drill: Drop-Drive: Volley Straight Drop - Drive (Deep Only) (Forehand)
  (Rule: Drive: The first bounce of all drives must land behind the T-line....)
• 9 pts: Conditioned Game: Drop-Drive: Drop-Drive (Deep Only) (Forehand)
  (Rule: Drive: all drives first bounces must land behind T-line. Drop: all...)
• Rest: 1.5 min

### Activity Block 5 ###
• 9 pts: Conditioned Game: Boast-Cross-Drive: Boast-Cross-Drive Deep Only (Forehand)
  (Rule: All shots excluding the boast must land behind the T-line.)
• 11 pts: Conditioned Game: Boast-Cross-Drive: Boast-Cross-Drive With Kills Allowed (Forehand)
  (Rule: For the cross-court and drive shots, the second bounce of the ball...)
• Rest: 1.5 min

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
End of session.
